text: @SpeakerPelosi Yes a bill was passed to help with fight against coronavirus. How DARE YOU try to through in money for your baby killing program! Keep trying to convince yourself what a devout Catholic you are. Catholics do not condone baby killing. Worse yet killing babies that could survive.
